messages.subject: Rurouni Kenshin fanart contest
messages.msgSnippet: Hellos to everyone! I going through one of the jaurnal enteries of one of the Deviantart peeps I keep an eye on and found this.   Its a Rurouni Kenshin fanart
messages.messageBody:
Hellos to everyone!

I going through one of the jaurnal enteries of one of the Deviantart peeps I keep an eye on and found this. Its a Rurouni Kenshin fanart contest hosted by Hakubaikou and a few of her friends. The theme is "Dreams and Nightmares" and the deadline is July 31st, 2005.

If any of you guys are intrested you can check out the website:
http://hakubaikou.com/contests/2005/frames.html

For Hakubaikou's Deviant page:
www.hakubaikou.deviantart.com



-Gladys
Bunneh ^______________^



__________________________________________________
